attributes.action: Don’t stop or cancel any local elections
attributes.additional_details: As many tax payers of the country feel at the moment we believe they are trying to slow the momentum of change within our political system where we need to be proud of our United Kingdom and fight for our people and do the things we vote and elect them to do so !
attributes.background: Don’t allow current or any government to cancel /delay / postpone any or all local elections

rejection.details: You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
